The Guardian reported overnight: Last week executives, including the editors of Rupert Murdoch 's four British papers, held a three-day meeting at Babington House in Somerset about the future of the company, aware that Rupert Murdoch is flying into London this week at a crucial time. "I'd be amazed if they didn't discuss Andy Coulson , said a source with some knowledge of the meeting. failure of Microsoft's hostile takeover bid for Yahoo has caused the Wall Street Journal to publish a report calling for a sell-off of the company's stock. as the Allen Iverson is set to retire from the NBA, according to an online report. Commentator Stephen A. Smith published a statement on his Web site Wednesday attributed to Allen Iverson . It said Allen Iverson plans to retire but also that I feel strongly that I can still compete at the highest level. The statement also said Allen Iverson has tremendous love for the game and the desire to play. "His legacy would be huge," Cleveland Cavaliers All-Star LeBron James said.
